reviewText: Fantastic women - and they really know how to show off what they've got.

Ten girls strut their stuff with a camera angle intended to give you a "customer's eye" view of a complete strip down lap dance; though with some dances the camera view changes to panorama, kind of spoiling the effect.  At any rate, all the girls try their best to pull off the effect, though some are obviously better at it than others.  And, some girls are simply more attractive with their wholesome natural figures making their dances a superior experience.

Based on their performance, and beauty of face and figure, one might rate each lap dance as follows, as they appear in sequence in the DVD:

1)Danni Ashe, Blonde, Rating:A.  Always a favorite, with her toned naturally voluptuous body and farm girl good looks, she probably pulls off one of the top three lap dance routines on this DVD.

2)Aria Giovanni, Brunette, Rating:A+.  Arguably one of the world's most beautiful models, she possesses sultry good looks and a matching natural figure of near perfect proportions that makes her already a prime lap dancer favorite before she even begins.  And, she pulls off her performance quite well, again probably in the top three, making her the obvious choice for the best lap dance rating.

3)Laurie Wallace, Blonde, Rating:C+. Actually, an attractive pleasant featured girl, but doesn't quit measure up.

4)Monique Alexander, Blonde, Rating:B.  A nice slim natural figure, she gives an acceptable lap dance performance.

5)Sunny Leone, Brunette.  Rating: B.  Nice dance, and attractive natural figure.

6)Swan, Red.  Rating: B+.  A good performance, but the lap dance impression was kind of lost now and then; still nice natural looks.

7)Friday, Brown.  Rating: B+.  She probably performed the best lap dance routine of all the girls.  Though, her strategically placed "F" tattoo probably stands for several alternate meanings other than her stage name.

8)Lorna Morgan, Brunette, Rating: A.  Lorna was a nice surprise, her pleasant English accent putting the viewer in the mood for a "London" lap dance.  She also wins the prize for having the most voluptuous, though adequately toned, figure; and natural to boot.  All this combined with a good solid performance rates her amongst the highest.

9)Mercedez, Brunette.  Rating: B-  A nice attempt, definitely worth watching.

10)Lisa Ann, Brown.  Rating: B-  Also a nice routine, and definitely worth finishing the DVD with.

As a side comment, the viewer can usually tell the sex of the person actually receiving the lap dance, and interestingly Danni and Aria both obviously performed them for women, which actually added to the erotic appeal of their virtual lap dances.

Bonus footage includes "2003 Bloopers and Highlights": an interesting and funny conclusion to this DVD.

No technical problems experienced with this DVD-a good high quality pressing.  All in all it was a well done video, including attractive women, and with enough naturally bountiful figures to please the ever demanding connoisseur.
